TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, you did understand how to download mods but didn't understand their mechanics.

I wish for a new mouse, not the rat!

How eggs-iting! A new page! I should romaine calm and just continue chiling! Lettuce begin a new page!

Granted, The mouse quickly dies after a cat sees him.

I wish a dozen of Potato fries. Bags of potatoes, with each bag being 10 Ton.

Edited January 23, 2022 by BlackMesaSurvivor
Al hail the New page comrades!

Granted, fast food companies file a lawsuit for having 12 ten-ton bags of potato fries. Good luck!

I wish for a good sleep

Granted. You hear the neighbor's snore and get pleased for his sleep.

I wish to carry my plates to the kitchen.

Granted, upon arriving, they, obviously, fall and break to tens of pieces. You slightly injure yourself. That hurts, but at least you managed to carry the plates to the kitchen! Aren't you proud?

I wish to find someone who likes Taylor Swift here

Granted, but that person immediately dislikes it

I wish the that stock planets would be x2.5 scale

Granted, you give up due to how hard getting to orbit is now.

I wish to learn more CSS tricks

Granted. Now you can work in the CSS circus for food.

2 hours ago, Kerbal Productions said:

I wish to find someone who likes Taylor Swift here

Everyone likes when the tailor is swift.

 

I wish the Moon hare had a pair.

3 minutes ago, kerbiloid said:

Everyone likes when the tailor is swift.

Granted, the Moon hair now has a pear.

I wish to be funnier

Granted: Everything you say makes people laugh but leaves you feeling depressed.

I wish there was some nice news in the world.

This morning a wombatess in Adelaide Zoo gave birth to three small blind wombalings. 
That's all nice news to the moment.


I wish they crossed ostrich and oyster.

Granted. They're both very cross about what you've done.

 

I wish for a GPU that doesn't regularly go kaput

Granted, it eventually went kaput though since you said regularly

I wish to not skip wishes

Granted: You now hop them.

I wish to know what will work.

Granted, you also know what will not work. So, you make them work. Not corrupted, but you know, it's fun.

I wish to hug my cat

Granted, it claws your eyes out.

I wish for accurate ray tracing in the stock game.

Granted. Now you can see every ray traced there.

I wish they crossed oyster and lobster.

Granted. Loboysters are a thing. However the creature proves to be ecologically damaging to the seas and they taste down right disgusting. This wish has single handled has ruined the oceans and scuttled the seafood industry.

On the topic of seafood, I wish for a baked haddock sandwich...before Loboysters depletes haddock stocks.

Granted, i couldn't even understand what was the wish you wished, so:

I wish the user below me to grant @Exploro's Wish.

Granted, but I don't even know what a baked haddock sandwich is, so a boat dock is wrapped in bread.

I wish KSP 2 would have a release date in 2022 announced.

Gramted. It's December, 65465.

(Yes, it's a day).

 

I wish I had a detailed historical 3d map of my city from its foundation with a timeline slider.

Granted. You can't use it.

 

I wish for MORE fish!

Granted. You are a guppy.

I wish the fishes had tanks. With tracks and turrets.

Granted, they kill humans with those. Hey, at least your wish was granted! What would you want more?

I wish for people to visit my forum thread about my interstellar voyages

Not granted because you didn't leave a link for it here.

I wish you leave a link here.
